hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas bin Malik that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“A good dream from a righteous man is one of the forty-six parts of prophecy.”

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّؤْيَا الصَّالِحَةِ يَرَاهَا الْمُسْلِمُ أَوْ تُرَى لَهُ
chapter.eng-name: A Good Dream That Is Seen By The Muslim, Or Is Seen About Him
